name: BeiJing Courier Simulator
description:
"After graduating from college, I resolutely gave up hundreds of millions of property.
I decided to stay in Beijing and be an ordinary courier.
I have to work hard on my career.
I set a small goal ： earned him a hundred million.
Then marry BaiFuMei and embark on the peak of life. ”

As a courier, can you open up your own business in the constant struggle?
Can you have a car? house?
Can you walk into the marriage hall with your favorite girl?

h2] Here you can do the following: [/h2]
1. Send the courier.
Then use your salary to make an investment, or buy a company's shares, and be your own boss?
Or go gambling (if you are lucky enough)?
Or invest in real estate and become a real estate predator?

2. Determined to join the home of Chaoyang people
Help the grandmother find a spatula and help the grandfather find LC brand glasses....
Or fight the bad guys and catch the robbers or thieves.
You are the best Chaoyang people.

3. Discover the memory of Old Summer Palace
Old Summer Palace, where glory and shame coexist.
What can you find here?

4.Girlfriend

How to get the heart of a girl? And with her to go to the marriage hall?
It depends on your own exploration.

5. Revitalizing a farm

Can TaiMei chicken farms prosper with your help?

6.Detective treasure
Will you find scrap cans in the village? Treasure? Or?

7. Test driver's license
Want to drive a better car? It has to be an old driver.
Right, pay attention to the car on the road. Note1. The game will keep updating , add interesting things;
2. Welcome to feedback ideas, suggestions, bugs in the comments. If your message is accepted, it will give you a Dabaobei (small gift);
